#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
double polygonArea(long int X[], long int Y[], long int numPoints) 
{ 
  long int i;         // Accumulates area in the loop
  double area=0;
	for(i=0;i<numPoints;i++)
	{
		if(i==numPoints-1)
		area+=(X[i]*Y[0]-X[0]*Y[i]);
		else
		area+=(X[i]*Y[i+1]-X[i+1]*Y[i]);
		
	}
	
  return abs(area/2);
} 
int main(){
 
    long int t;
   cin>>t;
    while(t--)
	{
 	   long  int n,i,j; //n for no. of polygon
 	   double area=0;
       cin>>n;
       long int X[n];
 	   long int Y[n];
	   long int val;
 	   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	   {
            cin>>X[i];
 					
   	   }
   	   for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	   {
            cin>>Y[i];
 					
   	   }
   	   
   	   area=polygonArea(X, Y, n);
   	   printf("%.1f",area);
            cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
